 I. <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎קַרְקַע‎</span> **noun [masculine]** ==floor== (probably reduplication from a √ <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎קרר‎</span>, or <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎קור‎</span>; Late Hebrew ***id., ground***, so [[BDB#Tg|ᵑ7]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎קַרְקְעָא‎</span>, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎קַרְקָעִיתָא‎</span>; apparently = Assyrian <abbr title="transliteration"><u>***‡a‡‡aru***</u></abbr>, ***ground***, ***earth***, Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***terra aequabilis mollisque***; compare [[BDB#Kö|Kö]]<sup>ii. 1, 91</sup>); — absolute <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ק‎</span> [[1Kgs.6.16|1Kgs 6:16]]; [[1Kgs.7.7|1Kgs 7:7]]a, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎קָ֑ע‎</span>- v[[1Kgs.7.7|1Kgs 7:7]]b (see below); construct <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎קַרְקַע‎</span> [[Num.5.17|Num 5:17]] +; — ***floor*** of temple [[1Kgs.6.15|1Kgs 6:15]] (twice in verse); [[1Kgs.6.16|1Kgs 6:16]]; [[1Kgs.6.30|1Kgs 6:30]]; [[1Kgs.7.7|1Kgs 7:7]]a; v[[1Kgs.7.7|1Kgs 7:7]]b read probably <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הַקּוֺרוֺת‎</span> ***rafters*** (compare [[1Kgs.6.15|1Kgs 6:15]] and <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎קוֺרָה‎</span>) [[BDB#Syr|ᵑ6]] [[BDB#Vg|ᵑ9]] [[BDB#The|Th]] [[BDB#Sta|Sta]] [[BDB#Kmp|Kmp]]<sup>Kau</sup> [[BDB#Benz|Benz]]; (***earth***)- ***floor*** of tabernacle [[Num.5.17|Num 5:17]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎קַרְקַע הַיָּם‎</span> [[Amos.9.3|Amos 9:3]] ***the floor***, bottom ***of the sea.***
